text: Sunil Kumar is an Indian politician, the current member of the Bihar Legislative Assembly from Biharsharif. In 2005, he first contested election from the Biharsharif seat in Nalanda district and defeated RJD leader Syed Naushadunnabi. In the 2005 and 2010 elections, Kumar contested with the ticket of Janata Dal (United); in 2015, he joined BJP and won his third election. == References == Category:Living people Category:Bihar MLAs 2005–2010 Category:Bihar MLAs 2010–2015 Category:Bihar MLAs 2015– Category:Indian politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Bihar Category:Janata Dal (United) politicians Category:1957 births
title: Sunil Kumar (politician)
